news.title: Dust to data centers: The year AI tech giants, and billions in debt, began remaking the American landscape
news.summary: Big Tech is remaking the U.S. map into an AI empire. It has kingdom-scale data centers, unprecedented debt, power constraints, and a near-religious belief in scaling.

news.title: Trump’s first vetoes of his second term hit bipartisan infrastructure projects, draw accusations of retribution
news.summary: Trump promised retribution after Colorado refused to release Tina Peters, who was convicted by a state court last year. Trump promised retribution for Colorado refusing to release Peters.

news.title: Google wraps up best year on Wall Street since 2009, beating megacap peers as AI story strengthens
news.summary: Shares of Alphabet rallied in 2025 as the company responded to skepticism of its position in artificial intelligence with new products that excited investors. Shares of Google's parent company, Alphabet, are up more than 10 percent this year.

news.title: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry says he's not shorting Tesla
news.summary: The Scion Asset Management founder responded to a user asking if he would bet against Tesla by saying: "I am not short." In a social media post on X, the Scion Asset management founder said he is not short.

news.title: Novo Nordisk enters 2026 on the defense as it faces a ‘must-win’ battle in the U.S. market
news.summary: The FDA approval of the Wegovy pill highlights many of the key themes Novo Nordisk will have to face in 2026. The Wegovi pill has been approved by the FDA for use in the U.S.

news.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
news.summary: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death,” he said.

news.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
news.summary: “Can someone who has not been found legally incompetent, but who has a history of delusions, make decisions regarding property?” he asks.

news.title: 20 stocks in the S&P 500 that gained the most in 2025
news.summary: Companies that added to huge gains the previous year included Robinhood, Palantir, Carvana and GE. Companies that lost huge gains in 2013 included GE, Robinhood and Carvana.

news.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
news.summary: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half,” he says. “I’ve been in and out of the hospital. I’m not a big fan of hospitals.”

news.title: Is the Times Square New Year’s Eve ball drop on your bucket list? Here’s why life goals like that aren’t worth the time or money.
news.summary: You can skip swimming with the dolphins, too. And you can skip going to the beach. You can also skip swimming in the ocean at all.
